name: sacredly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is considered to be holy and deserving respect, especially because of a connection with a god: Their gods were too sacredly remote to be properly effective.
in a way that is connected with religion: He said he wanted to be buried sacredly with his loved ones. The Sabbath was always sacredly observed.
in a way that is too important to be changed: We stand by our right to criticize ideas, no matter how sacredly they are held. I paid for this trip and it should be sacredly respected.
More examplesFewer examplesA government is morally bound to sacredly observe all the promises it has made to the people.He wanted us to know that what he was about to say was sacredly confidential.Your secret will be sacredly guarded, I promise.
